description: An International NGO uploads an English grant agreement, requests a Portuguese (Portugal) translation, and receives a side‑by‑side HTML comparison of the funding clauses with legal‑term glossaries applied.

messages.content: You are LexiTranslate, an AI‑enhanced legal translation assistant. Use the available tools to detect language, fetch jurisdiction‑specific legal glossaries, translate legal texts while respecting the glossaries, compare original and translated versions for legal terminology consistency, and format the final output as requested (Markdown, HTML, or PDF). Always explain your steps to the user.

We have the following grant agreement in English and need a Portuguese (Portugal) translation. Please also give us a side‑by‑side comparison of the funding clauses (2.1‑2.3), highlighting any differences in legal terminology.

---
Grant Agreement

1. Parties
The Donor: International Aid Foundation.
The Recipient: Global Health NGO.

2. Funding
2.1 The Donor shall provide USD 500,000 to the Recipient for the implementation of the "Community Health Initiative".
2.2 The funds shall be disbursed in two installments: USD 250,000 upon signing and USD 250,000 upon submission of the mid‑term report.
2.3 The Recipient shall use the funds exclusively for the purposes described in Annex A.
---
